android.support.test.internal.runner

Class SpockTestRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.test.internal.runner.SpockTestRequestBuilder

  • public class SpockTestRequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a Request from test classes in given apk paths, filtered on provided set of restrictions.

      • addTestClass

        public void addTestClass(java.lang.String className)
        Add a test class to be executed. All test methods in this class will be executed.

      • addTestMethod

        public void addTestMethod(java.lang.String testClassName,
                 java.lang.String testMethodName)
        Adds a test method to run.

        Currently only supports one test method to be run.

      • addAnnotationInclusionFilter

        public void addAnnotationInclusionFilter(java.lang.String annotation)
        Only run tests annotated with given annotation class.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the full class name of annotation

      • addAnnotationExclusionFilter

        public void addAnnotationExclusionFilter(java.lang.String notAnnotation)

        Parameters:
        notAnnotation - the full class name of annotation

      • addShardingFilter

        public void addShardingFilter(int numShards,
                     int shardIndex)

      • setSkipExecution

        public void setSkipExecution(boolean b)
        Build a request that will generate test started and test ended events, but will skip actual test execution.

      • build

        public TestRequest build(android.app.Instrumentation instr,
                android.os.Bundle bundle)
        Builds the TestRequest based on current contents of added classes and methods.

        If no classes have been explicitly added, will scan the classpath for all tests.
